text: Big-step Semantics (call-by-reference) (fully static scope rules) Envp = (Proc = Stm x Var x Envy)* (: Proc — Stm x Var x Envy is an element of the stack) . Structural Operational Semantics — — Format: €,I1+,(S,6) > & (where IT € Envp, ...) - 8+ 80a F; (5,0) > ¢ ap)=(S,x, € (call-REF-lyg) — — —— 0 E &, mI1 F; (call p(y),6) => &' I (call p(y),6) > & p & dom(n) (call-REF-29) —2— AN PR/ D PR T &, aI1 F; (call p(y),6) => &’
